description: This file contains utility functions and constants for managing notes, slides, projects, and importing/exporting data in a presentation application. It defines functions for generating UUIDs, creating slides and projects, parsing imported notes from JSON or Markdown, and saving/loading project data to local storage.

methods.name: createSlideForNote
methods.description: Creates a new slide object associated with a note ID, using default styles.

methods.name: createDefaultProject
methods.description: Creates a default project with a welcome note and no slides.

methods.name: parseImportedNotes
methods.description: Parses imported note data from a File object, supporting JSON array or Markdown format.

methods.name: saveProject
methods.description: Saves the current project to local storage.

methods.name: loadProject
methods.description: Loads the project data from local storage.
